original_text: And flocks shall lie down in the midst of her, all the beasts of the nations: both the cormorant and the bittern shall lodge in the upper lintels of it; their voice shall sing in the windows; desolation shall be in the thresholds; for he shall uncover the cedar work.
korean_text: 각종 짐승이 그 가운데에 떼로 누울 것이며 당아와 고슴도치가 그 기둥 꼭대기에 깃들이고 그것들이 창에서 울 것이며 문턱이 적막하리니 백향목으로 지은 것이 벗겨졌음이라

sentences.original_text: all the beasts of the nations:
both the cormorant and the bittern
shall lodge in the upper lintels of it;
their voice shall sing in the windows;
desolation shall be in the thresholds;
for he shall uncover the cedar work.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 백향목 공교한 것을 드러내었음이라
